TopicTitle: make numers easier to read with commas

Articles.Content:
Rocketry deals with stupidly large numbers. and in order to break down such huge numbers comas are added every three didgets to enable there hugeness to be gathered at a single glance, for example

656164.00

656,164.00

the seccond number is much easier to gauge at a moments glance, rather than having to manually count the didgets yourself each and every time.

I mean, if my rocket costs 1536313.00 is that cheap or dear? I have to work it out.

but displayed like this 1,536,313.00 suddenly the answer is crystal clear.

such a change is so small and would have such a huge impact on the easy of using currency that It should deffinately be added to the game ASAP

I 100% agree. 300000000 is a lot harder to read than 300,000,000
